remarks: Subtract two integrals over the same domain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itgadd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgadd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgadd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. V ) $.
itgadd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblsub $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B - C ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
